name: Swift/SwiftUI macOS App
prompt_template:
This is a Swift/SwiftUI macOS application project.

Project Structure:
- Uses Swift Package Manager (Package.swift)
- Main entry point: Sources/{PROJECT_NAME}/App.swift
- Views: Sources/{PROJECT_NAME}/*.swift
- Build with: swift build
- Run with: swift run

When implementing:
- Follow SwiftUI best practices
- Use @State, @Binding, @ObservableObject as appropriate
- Structure views in separate files
- Include Package.swift with proper dependencies
- Ensure all Swift files are in Sources/{PROJECT_NAME}/ directory
